com.oregonscientific.meep
Class MEEPEnvironment

java.lang.Object
  com.oregonscientific.meep.MEEPEnvironment

public class MEEPEnvironment
extends Object

Provides access to environment variables.

Field Detail

DIRECTORY_MUSIC

public static final String DIRECTORY_MUSIC
Standard directory in which to place any audio files that are available to the user. Note that this is primarily a convention for the top-level public directory, as the media scanner will find and collect music in any directory.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

DIRECTORY_MOVIE

public static final String DIRECTORY_MOVIE
Standard directory in which to place movies that are available to the user. Note that this is primarily a convention for the top-level public directory, as the media scanner will find and collect movies in any directory.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

DIRECTORY_EBOOK

public static final String DIRECTORY_EBOOK
Standard directory in which to place ebooks that are available to the user. Note that this is primarily a convention for the top-level public directory, as the media scanner will find and collect e-books in any directory.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

DIRECTORY_GAME

public static final String DIRECTORY_GAME
Standard directory in which to place games that are available to the user

See Also:
Constant Field Values

DIRECTORY_APP

public static final String DIRECTORY_APP
Standard directory in which to place apps that are downloaded from a remote location

Method Detail

getDownloadCacheDirectory

public static File getDownloadCacheDirectory()
Gets the MEEP download/cache content directory.

getMediaStorageDirectory

public static File getMediaStorageDirectory()
Gets the MEEP media storage directory.

getUserMediaStorageDirectory

public static File getUserMediaStorageDirectory(String meepTag)
Return the media storage directory for a user. This is for use by applications to store files relating to the user. This directory shoulbe be deleted when the user is removed.

getStoragePublicDirectory

public static File getStoragePublicDirectory(String type)
Get a top-level public media storage directory for placing files of a particular type. This is where applications should place and manage their files for the given type.

Parameters:
type - The type of media to store. Should be one of DIRECTORY_EBOOK, DIRECTORY_APP, DIRECTORY_GAME, DIRECTORY_MOVIE or DIRECTORY_MUSIC. May not be null.
Returns:
The File object of the given directory type

getStoragePublicDirectory

public static File getStoragePublicDirectory(String meepTag,
                                             String type)
Gets a top-level media storage directory isolated for the given user for placing files of a particular type.

Parameters:
meepTag - The unique MEEP user id. May not be null.
type - The type of media to store. Should be one of DIRECTORY_EBOOK, DIRECTORY_APP, DIRECTORY_GAME, DIRECTORY_MOVIE or DIRECTORY_MUSIC. May not be null.
Returns:
The File object of the given directory type isolated for the given user
